title: Phase 1: Core UBS to Beads transformation
description: Implement basic UBS JSON to Beads JSONL pipeline with stdin/stdout interface

title: Phase 2: Bidirectional sync and state tracking
description: Add SQLite tracking DB, update detection, and resolution handling

title: Add SQLite tracking database
description: Create pkg/db/tracking.go with SQLite schema for finding-to-issue mapping
design: Schema: findings(fingerprint PK, issue_id, file, line, severity, category, message, first_seen, last_seen, resolved_at). Fingerprint = sha256(file+category+message+code_context)
acceptance_criteria: DB stores/retrieves findings, supports queries by fingerprint and issue_id, tests pass

title: Implement diff detection
description: Create pkg/sync/diff.go to detect new/changed/resolved findings
design: Compare current UBS findings against tracking DB. Return 3 sets: new (not in DB), changed (severity differs), resolved (in DB but not in current scan)
acceptance_criteria: Correctly identifies all three states from test fixtures

title: Build sync command
description: Create cmd/strung/sync.go subcommand for incremental sync
design: Read UBS JSON from stdin, compute diffs, create/update/close Beads issues via bd CLI. Flags: --db-path, --auto-close, --dry-run, --min-severity
acceptance_criteria: Works: ubs --format=json | strung sync --db-path=.strung.db

title: Add resolution detection
description: Implement auto-close for resolved findings
design: When finding disappears from scan, optionally close corresponding Beads issue via bd close. Controlled by --auto-close flag
acceptance_criteria: Resolved findings closed when --auto-close=true, logged when false

title: Add metadata enrichment
description: Enhance Beads issues with tags and links
design: Add UBS category as Beads tag. Generate repo file links (GitHub/GitLab). Include scan timestamp in description
acceptance_criteria: Created issues have tags, contain clickable file links, show scan time

title: Add integration tests for sync workflow
description: Create testdata/sync-scenarios/ with multi-scan test cases
acceptance_criteria: Tests cover: first sync, subsequent sync with changes, resolution detection. Coverage > 80%

title: Update documentation for Phase 2
description: Update README.md, add SYNC.md usage guide, update CLI help text
design: README: sync workflow section. SYNC.md: comprehensive guide. CLI: --help for sync subcommand
acceptance_criteria: README has sync examples, SYNC.md exists, sync --help shows usage

title: Add error handling and transaction safety
description: Implement rollback/recovery for partial failures during sync
design: Operation log table tracks actions. File locking prevents concurrent corruption. --recover flag fixes inconsistencies. Retry logic for transient failures
acceptance_criteria: Partial failures don't leave orphaned issues, --recover fixes inconsistencies

title: Phase 1: Core UBS to Beads transformation
description: Implement basic UBS JSON to Beads JSONL pipeline with stdin/stdout interface

title: Define Beads issue struct
description: Create pkg/beads/issue.go with complete Beads issue type
design: Fields: id, title, type, priority, status, description, design, acceptance, assignee, timestamps
acceptance_criteria: Struct marshals to valid Beads JSONL format

title: Implement UBS JSON parser
description: Create pkg/parser/ubs.go to parse UBS findings array
design: Parse UBS JSON schema: findings array with file, line, column, severity, category, message, suggestion, code_snippet fields
acceptance_criteria: Successfully parses real UBS output; validates required fields

title: Implement transformation logic
description: Create pkg/transform/transform.go mapping UBS findings to Beads issues
design: Map: severity to priority, severity to type, file:line to title, message to description
acceptance_criteria: Transforms UBS finding to valid Beads issue with all fields populated

title: Build CLI entry point
description: Create cmd/strung/main.go with stdin/stdout pipeline
design: Read JSON from stdin, transform, write JSONL to stdout. Flags: --min-severity, --version, --verbose
acceptance_criteria: Works: ubs --format=json src/ | strung | bd import

title: Add test fixtures and unit tests
description: Create testdata/ with real UBS output, add unit and integration tests
acceptance_criteria: All tests pass with greater than 80 percent coverage
